name: Xenogears
overview: Beyond the beginning...and the end. Staged on a human colony far in the future, Xenogears' story centers around the war between the nations and their endless power struggle. With nations constantly dueling for power and resources, warfare has escalated to new levels thanks to enormous combat machines called Gears. Trapped by destiny in the middle of the crisis' latest escalation, is a young man named Fei, who after being exiled from his home village, must scour the world while meeting new allies, and looking for clues to his forgotten past and the unknown destructive power that dwells within him. Xenogears is a title that always has been imbued with controversy and mysticism, due to harboring concepts like the role of religion or the human psycology, thus facing localization difficulties and even countries prohibiting its own release. Immerse yourself into SquareSoft's magnum opus and the most ambitious and magnificent story ever written for a video game; an unrepeatable experience with adult, profound, and taboo themes. Be part of an unforgettable journey that goes beyond the limits of imagination, and one that will make you reflect about the true meaning of God.
